name: Ef to the undersoul Act1
description:
_Ef to the Undersoul Act1  (0/1/2)_

Eveline is a shy and introverse nerd teenager.

In this act you are going to guide her to her date with...someone.

_Credits_

kappoVG for organ music(me)

CO.AG musci for OST(yt channel)

SRD,ELI,MOG,TERRAX,UPP and YANFLY for plugins

NINI25 and WOMBO AI for Art

_HOW TO PLAY!_

Computer

1.Create a folder and extract Zip

2 Open game.exe

3. Leave a comment ;)

Phone(only android)

1.Create a folder and extract Zip in the archive

2. Open Joyplay(emulator in appstore)

3. Add a game ad select game.exe(in download)

4.Leave a comment ;)

_CONTROLS_

WASD: move

SHIFT+WASD: run

O: use flashlight

P: turn off flashlight

ESC: open menu
